metadata.title: Input and Local Variables guide
metadata.description:
This page introduces input variables and local variables as a way to
parameterize a configuration.

outlineItems.title: Using Variables and locals in Configuration

`)),mdx("p",null,`As you can see in the example, you can access your variables directly by
giving them the `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`var.`),` or `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`local.`),` prefix. If you want to embed the variables

metadata.title: Packer by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Packer helps you create golden images for multiple platforms from a single source configuration.

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Packer Integrations.
